message.body: Hey!! Not sure if you were still thinking about the pool but wondering if we could post pone for next week? I got my period today and feel a lil zonked.
Haha yeah next week is great!!
Girl I just got my period after 22 MONTHS. It sucked. I have total sympathy
Holy shit!! 22 months period free sounds like a dream!
You too can enjoy that period free life, just get yrself pregnant!
I think my body needs it! My cramps are so bad. Body is so mad at me for not being pregnant month after month!
Hahhaa yeah well pregnancy comes with its own pains
